title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1025.24 - ORM-E
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1025.24 - ORM-E
State Regulations

Materials listed under this class are restricted to a
maximum quantity per vehicle of 20,000 pounds gross weight; provided, however, that such materials are in metal drums or containers of 55 gallons or
less. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1025.24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
